values:
"Give a girl the right shoes, and she can conquer the world." - Marilyn Monroe
I have a pair of Vera Wang heels that I absolutely love. They make my 5'1" look a little closer to 5'6" and it's all leg! The only downside is I can't wear them for too long. I don't have the tough skin in the right places for those shoes not to hurt in the worst way. I suppose that means that I won't be conquering the world in those puppies but they'll stay in my closet no matter what. So, for some reason, I have hit a wall. It's a wall of fear I think! I want, so badly, to go back to school. I keep telling myself that if I want this bad enough then I will do the work and succeed. The only problem is that I know me. No matter how bad I want something I will find a way to slack, cut corners, and screw things up. I always have and I always will. My other worry is the deal with student loans! I know so many people who have finished school only to be hunted down by their banks. I guess it's all the unknown that's been keeping me from accomplishing anything! I've never been good with unknowns. I keep telling myself I need to just stop worrying and jump in, both feet, but I just can't push myself to do it. I think I just need to sack up and deal. Now it's just a matter of pushing myself to do this.

I was reminded of this old journal today, I decided I should check it out, see if I can remember the days when I wrote in this for hours! After reading a bit of it, I don't so much remember writing in it but I do recall the hours I would spend making icons to represent my moods and whatnot.

Life has gotten to be too busy it seems, I'm seeing that LJ has a Mobile Posting features ... I'll have to see what I can do with it.

Until then, I'm just updating so that people know I'm alive. Surprise!

Me: Your momma's so hairy that the only language she speaks is wookie.
Mom: wtf?
Me: lols
Mom: *stare*
Me: And guess what!? You can't give me a momma joke back because you're my momma!
Mom: ... are you retarded?

Okay this is soooooo cool! Jenn gave me the code so I can get this! I love her! ^_^ Thanks Jenn! For now I am just going to try to figure out how to use this thing, so I'll come back and post something when I figure it out! (CONFUSING!) 
*Kiera has a simple mind* u.u()
